Grey Lynn’s Richmond Rovers rugby league club claims local resident made noise complaints, filmed young players https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/richmond-rovers-juniors-convenor-claims-members-are-being-harassed-by-a-neighbour/UVHHLC6JAVAL3EN6VDABBX5AVY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/richmond-rovers-juniors-convenor-claims-members-are-being-harassed-by-a-neighbour/UVHHLC6JAVAL3EN6VDABBX5AVY/ Lincoln Tan'We feel harassed by his constant passive-aggressive nonsense and we are over it.' Sun, 17 Dec 2023 05:33:48 +0000 The Richmond Rovers rugby league club has been part of the Grey Lynn sporting community for 110 years. Photo / Alex Burton
How huge university job cuts threaten NZ’s science future - Jamie Morton https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-university-job-cuts-threaten-nzs-science-future-jamie-morton/BDEVXBHBKNHF3JAEFGBV4M2XSE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-university-job-cuts-threaten-nzs-science-future-jamie-morton/BDEVXBHBKNHF3JAEFGBV4M2XSE/ Jamie MortonUnending turmoil in our universities is heaping more strain on NZ's small science system. Sun, 17 Dec 2023 05:30:00 +0000 Students mount a protest outside the Albany campus of Massey University, which last week decided to cut more than 60 positions at its College of Sciences. Scientists fear the turmoil seen across universities will have long-lasting impacts. Photo / Niklas Polzer

Queenstown crash victim Outrega ‘Tré' Anderson was head butcher at Royalburn Station https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queenstown-crash-victim-outrega-tre-anderson-was-head-butcher-at-royalburn-station/AHKQET4P6FHZRBEN33SYFAZDKM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queenstown-crash-victim-outrega-tre-anderson-was-head-butcher-at-royalburn-station/AHKQET4P6FHZRBEN33SYFAZDKM/ Tracey RoxburghVictim of a fatal car crash near Queenstown was a head butcher and 'master charcutier'. Sun, 17 Dec 2023 04:34:22 +0000 Outrega "Tré" Anderson, Royalburn Station's head butcher and master charcutier, was killed in a car crash near Arrow Junction on Saturday morning. Photo / Instagram

Coroner rules on mystery death of Alexandra fruit picker Christopher Bates, says cause, circumstances remain unknown https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-rules-on-mystery-death-of-alexandra-fruit-picker-christopher-bates-says-cause-circumstances-remain-unknown/FUFEPJI7QFC2XCNZDP25CPZOPY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-rules-on-mystery-death-of-alexandra-fruit-picker-christopher-bates-says-cause-circumstances-remain-unknown/FUFEPJI7QFC2XCNZDP25CPZOPY/ Raphael FranksBates went out to buy cigarettes on February 11, 2018 and was never seen again.
